channel.title: Macro Economic Factors on FinanClub

item.title: AMAT
item.description: score:69 Chances: The semiconductor market is expected to grow by double digits in 2024. A jump in semiconductor equipment spending could supercharge this company that’s trading at an attractive valuation today. Applied Materials is collaborating with Google on advanced technologies for augmented reality (AR), positioning the company to benefit from the growing AR market.
